title: 856 Picnic Time Formaggio
description:
The Formaggio another original gourmet cheese board and tools set by Picnic Time. It features a wooden two-toned oval cutting board with slide-out drawer to hold four-piece stainless steel cheese tools. Made of eco-friendly bamboo, one of the fastest growing trees in the world, the Formaggio measures 7.9" x 8.7" x 2". A drawer at the base of the board pulls out to reveal four ergonomic, hollow-handled stainless steel cheese tools. With its classic style and beauty, the Formaggio will impress your guests when you present it at your next party.

Components:
1 stainless steel blunt-nosed hard cheese knife
1 stainless steel cheese shaver
1 stainless steel cheese fork
1 stainless steel hard cheese knife/spreader

Made of eco-friendly bamboo, one of the fastest growing trees in the world, the Formaggio measures 7.9" x 8.7" x 2". transcripts: The Formaggio is another original gourmet cheese board by Picnic Time. It is a two toned oval cutting board with a slide out drawer that holds four stainless steel cheese tools with over 84 square inches of cutting surface, the Formaggio is made of eco-friendly bamboo. A drawer at the base of the board pools out to reveal four ergonomic hollow handle stainless steel cheese tools including a blunt nosed soft cheese knife, a chisel knife, a cheese fork, and a hard cheese knife and spreader combo. With its classic style and beauty, the Formaggio will impress your guests when you present it at your next party.
